hero.title: Hey, I'm
hero.subtitle: I’m a Full-Stack Web Development student with a strong interest in building reliable and scalable web applications.

about.title: ABOUT ME
about.p1: I’m a passionate and detail-oriented web developer who enjoys turning ideas into functional, clean, and user-focused digital experiences. I work mainly with React on the front end and Laravel on the back end, and I’m constantly improving my skills by building real projects, experimenting with new tools, and solving practical problems.
about.p2: What drives me most is understanding how things work under the hood from managing state and routing on the client side to designing APIs and handling data on the server. I care deeply about code quality, performance, and user experience, and I always try to write code that is readable, scalable, and maintainable.
about.p3: My goal is to grow into a strong, reliable full-stack developer who creates meaningful products and continuously evolves with technology.

backend.title: Backend Development
backend.description: I enjoy building robust, secure, and scalable systems. I work mainly with Laravel, designing APIs, managing databases, and handling authentication and server-side logic. I care about clean architecture, performance, and reliability.

frontend.title: Frontend Development
frontend.description: Building modern and intuitive user interfaces with best practices in mind. I focus on performance, accessibility, and user experience while following modern web standards.

YSFSHOOP.description: This e-commerce application is built as a full-stack system with a React-based frontend and a Laravel backend. In addition to standard product, cart, and order management through RESTful APIs, the platform includes a Marketplace feature where users can buy and sell their own items.A real-time chat system is implemented using WebSockets, enabling instant messaging between buyers and sellers within each listing. The chat supports message status (sent, seen), media sharing (images and audio), and optimistic UI updates for a smooth user experience.The application includes secure authentication and authorization, uses a relational database to ensure data integrity, and is designed with scalability, clean architecture, and efficient request handling in mind.

bloggy.description: A multi-user blogging platform built with Laravel and React, using MySQL for data storage. Features include authentication, CRUD posts, comments, responsive design with CSS, and a dynamic, component-based UI

CRM.description: CRM developed with React and Redux Toolkit for efficient state management. It provides full opportunity management with CRUD operations, a drag-and-drop sales pipeline, and a responsive interface built with Tailwind CSS. The system enables tracking prospects, managing the sales workflow, and easily visualizing deal progress. The project includes secure user authentication with admin and sales roles, as well as an analytical dashboard for performance tracking. Real-time notifications enhance the responsiveness of the sales team. The application is optimized for performance and maintainability, using a modular architecture that makes it easy to add new features.

lifenote.description: Note App is a secure note-taking application with authentication and protected routes. Users can create, edit, delete, and view notes (CRUD) stored in a JSON server API. Notes can be filtered by category and searched via a search bar for quick access.

leoMovies.description: Movie App is a dynamic web application that fetches data from a complex movie API to display movies and series in a clean, user-friendly interface. Users can browse trending movies, view detailed information for each title, and explore TV series with ease.
